committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To provide emergency assistance to enable the State of Rhode Island to expedite the repayment of depositors at State-chartered banks and credit unions that are in receivership and to facilitate the resolution of such receiverships.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to guarantee the repayment of specified amounts borrowed by the State of Rhode Island or the Depositors Economic Protection Corporation to expedite the repayment of depositors at State-chartered banks and credit unions in receivership, and to facilitate receivership resolution. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide emergency assistance to enable the State of Rhode Island to expedite the repayment of depositors at State-chartered banks and credit unions that are in receivership and to facilitate the resolution of such receiverships.
